trans-unit.source: Provides a method that a host application can use to clear the tracking profile cache.
trans-unit.target: 提供方法，主應用程式可用來清除追蹤設定檔快取。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] When the workflow runtime engine has one or more tracking services registered with it, the runtime tracking infrastructure must determine whether tracking profiles exist for any workflow that is loaded into memory.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]當工作流程執行階段引擎已向它的一個或多個追蹤服務時，執行階段追蹤基礎結構必須判斷追蹤設定檔是否存在任何載入記憶體中的工作流程。

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure maintains a cache of tracking profiles which it checks before it requests a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the workflow from each tracking service.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段追蹤基礎結構維護的追蹤設定檔的之前它會先檢查快取要求<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>從每個追蹤服務工作流程。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: The TrackingProfileCache class provides a static method, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileCache.Clear%2A>, which a host application can use to clear the tracking profile cache.
trans-unit.target: TrackingProfileCache 類別提供靜態方法， <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileCache.Clear%2A>，主應用程式可以用來清除追蹤設定檔快取。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileCache.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: This will force the runtime tracking infrastructure to load tracking profiles from its registered tracking services for any workflow instances that are loaded into memory after the cache is cleared.
trans-unit.target: 這會強制執行階段追蹤基礎結構從它登錄的追蹤服務中清除快取之後載入記憶體中的任何工作流程執行個體載入追蹤設定檔。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> caching is not supported for markup only workflows.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>快取不支援僅標記工作流程。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: Clears the tracking profile cache maintained by the runtime tracking infrastructure of all tracking profiles.
trans-unit.target: 清除的追蹤設定檔的所有追蹤設定檔，執行階段追蹤基礎結構所維護的快取。

trans-unit.source: After the cache is cleared, the runtime tracking infrastructure will load tracking profiles directly from its registered tracking services for any workflow instances loaded into memory.
trans-unit.target: 清除快取之後，執行階段追蹤基礎結構會直接從它登錄的追蹤服務中的任何工作流程執行個體載入記憶體載入追蹤設定檔。

trans-unit.source: Any workflow instance that is in memory and is running will not need to have its tracking profiles reloaded unless the workflow is unloaded and then reloaded into memory.
trans-unit.target: 已在記憶體中且正在執行任何工作流程執行個體將不需要重新載入工作流程已卸載，然後重新載入到記憶體中，除非其追蹤設定檔。
